body: is there a place where theres the teamspeak rules if not are we allowed to put 'loud' music in the music room

title: Question about TeamSpeak

replies.body:
Not quite sure what you mean.
I'm guessing you're asking if you can play loud music in the music room?

You can but only if everyone in the room has given their concent.
